notes:
✨ v1.5.3 Update

✨ Improvements
- Expanded Roll Support: Added native support for systems that embed roll data directly into chat HTML (e.g., 13th Age).
- Analysis Dialog: Updated to correctly parse and display data from these HTML-based rolls.

announcement.title: ✨ v1.5.3 Update
announcement.content: Added native support for systems with inline HTML rolls (e.g., 13th Age).
